70010000087058.description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor, where each wave can bring new adventures or deadly threats. Stranded on a fragile raft with only a hook, you must gather resources, battle fierce predators, and transform your raft into a secure floating haven. Survive alone or with friends on this treacherous ocean quest!
Key Features:
	•	Survive Shark Attacks: Defend yourself against relentless shark threats. Fortify your raft and stay one step ahead!
	•	Resource Crafting: Collect resources to build essential tools and upgrade your raft into a secure oasis.
	•	Hook Mastery: Use your hook to snag drifting debris and vital supplies—each catch is a step toward survival.
	•	Raft Expansion: Upgrade and personalize your floating base with new sections and decorative touches.
	•	Fishing & Cooking: Catch fish and cook meals to stay energized on your journey.
	•	Water Filtration: Convert seawater into drinkable fresh water to keep hydrated.
	•	Island Exploration: Discover new islands, unearth civilization remnants, and gather valuable resources.
Will you survive the dangers of the ocean and build a thriving sanctuary, or will the waves claim your fate? The ocean adventure of a lifetime awaits in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor!
70010000087058.intro: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.
70010000087058.name: Float Survival Simulator - Ocean Survivor

70010000088811.description:
Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and build amazing structures for your blocks. Sounds easy? Think again! – you only have so much room on your bench, and if you overfill it, it's game over!

Every level gives you new challenges to solve, but don't worry – you have power-ups to help! Undo a move, reshuffle blocks, or add extra bench space when you're in a tough spot. Earn coins along the way to customize your blocks and make your diorama totally unique!

For an extra challenge, try "Bus Mode" – the classic Block Jam experience with a colorful twist! Match blocks to fill color-coded buses and watch them roll out. Complete all buses in a level, and you'll earn even more power-ups and coins to help you on your journey!

Features:
- Match and Win: Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and avoid overfilling your bench.
- Limited Bench: Use your bench wisely – a full bench means game over!
- Bus Mode: Fill color-matched buses to clear levels and earn extra power-ups and coins!
- Fun Power-Ups: Use undo, magnet, reshuffle, or expand your bench to escape tricky situations.
- Build Your Diorama: Collect bricks to create unique structures in your very own block-populated diorama.
- Customize Your Blocks: Use coins earned in-game to give your diorama blocks unique and fun looks.

Jump into Block Jam – where every move is a step closer to clearing the board, personalizing your world, and mastering each challenge!
70010000088811.intro: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!
70010000088811.name: Block Jam

70010000089177.description:
In Car Cops, you’re more than just a regular cop – you’re the sharp-eyed officer who never misses a clue! Patrol the streets, pull over suspicious drivers, and dive into the action-packed life of a police officer. Each stop could lead to a dangerous criminal, a desperate chase, or someone in need of urgent help.

Check IDs, inspect faces, and scan every detail to decide if the driver is innocent or up to no good. From cutting open seat cushions, to defusing bombs in car trunks, you’ll need to stay alert and rely on your instincts and gear. And when a wanted criminal crosses your path, prepare for a heart-pounding chase – and don’t hesitate to take action when it’s time to draw your weapon!

But it’s not just about the bad guys – you’re there for the people, too. Some drivers might need CPR, others may have a car fire or a breakdown that only you can handle!

Features:
- Detailed Vehicle Inspections: Check IDs, match faces, and look for suspicious items in cars.
- Intense Car Chases: Follow criminals on the run in fast-paced pursuits across town.
- Showdowns with Criminals: Be ready for action when criminals fight back – take cover and return fire to stay safe.
- Professional Police Tools: Use x-rays, slice through seat fabric, and explore every corner of the car for hidden surprises.
- Deliver Justice: Bring suspects to court, where you decide if they’re guilty or innocent.
- Emergency Responder Role: Jump into action, offering CPR, putting out car fires, or helping with breakdowns on the road.

Think you can spot a criminal at first glance? Put your instincts to the test!
70010000089177.intro: From traffic stops to high-speed chases – think you’ve got what it takes to keep the streets safe?
70010000089177.name: Car Cops

70050000053423.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Teddy Bear outfit
- Harley outfit
- Superhero Girl outfit
- Ice Queen outfit
- Maid outfit
- Pilot outfit
- Rabbit Ears outfit
- extra 5000 cash to buy furniture and make your home the perfect place to relax after a hard day at work

Unlock 7 unique outfits for your police officer, perfect for every undercover mission or just adding flair to your beat!
70050000053423.intro: Dress up on the job and make your home your own!
70050000053423.name: Car Cops: Drip Patrol

70050000053433.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- 6 fancy hats for the blocks that live on your dioramas!
- 15 of each power-up for an easier time!

Get ready to match, clear, and decorate with flair!
70050000053433.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and stylish hats!
70050000053433.name: Block Jam: Fancy Power

70050000053436.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- 6 cute hats for the blocks that live on your dioramas!
- 15 of each power-up for an easier time!

Get ready to match, clear, and decorate with flair!
70050000053436.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and lovely hats!
70050000053436.name: Block Jam: Cute Power

70050000053502.description:
Transform your supermarket into a stylish and inviting space with siMarket Supermarket Simulator - Clean & Decoration! This DLC adds 15 new products focused on cleaning and decor, including all the essentials to keep your store sparkling and a range of items to add charm and personality. From cleaning supplies to decorative products, each item brings a new layer of realism and customization, helping you create a store environment that shoppers will love.
Elevate the look and feel of your supermarket with fresh paint options for the walls, unique shelving units like the Pyramid and Corner shelves, and even a small but eye-catching decorative garbage bin to complete the scene. With these additions, you can shape your store’s style to suit your vision and bring an extra dose of personality to every corner.
Take your supermarket to the next level with Clean & Decoration DLC!
70050000053502.intro: Freshen up your supermarket with new cleaning items, decor, paint options, and unique shelves!
70050000053502.name: siMarket Supermarket Simulator - Clean & Decoration

70010000086882.description:
"Jewel Fever 3" is the much improved successor to the highly succesful "Jewel Fever 2" which is played by millions of people. 
It adds new gamemodes, better graphics and finally local and online multiplayer!

It features:
- Classic gamemodes Normal, Quick and Infinite!
- Mission mode with 30 missions to solve!
- AI-mode with 4 different AI-Opponents in 2 game modes! 
- Local and online multiplayer!
- 15 Achievements
70010000086882.name: Jewel Fever 3

70010000088891.description: Prepare delicious pizzas with the right ingredients, bake them for the perfect amount of time, and improve your pizzeria while meeting charming characters in person or through delivery orders in Pizza Maker.
70010000088891.name: Pizza Maker

70010000090404.description:
You are Santa Clause and it's your task to deliver all the Christmas presents, just in time for the holidays.

Hop on your sleigh, fly over a bustling town, decide who's been good or bad and deliver lots of wonderful presents to all the happy townsfolk.

Watch out for obstacles in the sky! Can you make it in time for Christmas?
70010000090404.name: Learn to Play - Santa's Sleigh Ride

70010000091205.description:
In Cats Visiting Underwater World, dive into stunning underwater scenes where hidden cats await. From shipwrecks nestled in vibrant coral reefs to the corridors of ancient, submerged temples, every location is filled with beauty, mystery, and feline friends.

Alongside finding hidden cats, each artwork holds a special collectible item. Gather these treasures to complete a unique collection, adding an exciting layer of exploration and challenge to every scene.

Get ready to dive deep, search carefully, and enjoy this magical journey. Each scene brings new secrets, surprises, and, of course, adorable cats waiting to be found!
70010000091205.intro: Dive into a hidden-cat adventure! Explore vibrant coral reefs, sunken temples, and ancient shipwrecks to uncover cats and collect rare treasures.
70010000091205.name: Cats Visiting Underwater World

70010000045868.description:
Love cooking games? Manage 9 distinct kitchens, craft over 500 dishes, and rise to culinary stardom across 1000+ fast-paced levels in Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire. Customize your home, unlock trophies, and bring the heat!

From street food to sushi, each kitchen will test your time-management skills as you work to satisfy impatient customers and hit your goals. But it’s not all about the kitchens—customize and upgrade your home to showcase your achievements, unlock trophies, and build a true empire!

Perfect for players of all ages, this game offers fast-paced fun that’s easy to pick up, but tough to master. Can you handle the heat and build your own cooking empire?

Key Features:

9 Unique Cuisines: Master a range of cooking styles and menus.
500+ Dishes: A global selection of recipes to perfect.
1000+ Levels: Challenge yourself with increasingly complex kitchens.
Home Customization: Upgrade your furniture and earn trophies to showcase your progress.
Fun & Fast-Paced: Simple to play, with endless hours of culinary excitement!
70010000045868.intro: Master the Kitchen and Build Your Empire!
70010000045868.name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire

70010000079835.description:
Soar to the top scores while hanging out with the world’s most rad grandmas in "Airborne Grannies."

These ladies in their sixties are not just passing time—they're setting records and redefining "cool" with each jump.


It’s a game that mixes the nostalgia of arcade classics with a fresh, uproarious twist. 

Eager for a challenge? These grannies sure are, inviting you to a riot of excitement and laughter.


Who says the golden years are for slowing down?
70010000079835.intro: Care Plan: Defying Gravity and Age
70010000079835.name: Airborne Grannies

70010000088220.description: Dive into Detail Hunter, the premier spot-the-difference game that will put your attention to detail to the test! Experience a world of vivid, cartoon-style visuals and challenging puzzles. Explore a variety of dynamic environments, select your difficulty level, and use hints wisely as you race against the clock. Reveal hidden secrets and sharpen your detective skills to become the ultimate detail hunter. Whether you’re aiming to unwind or challenge yourself, this game offers an immersive and exciting experience for keen observers everywhere.
70010000088220.intro: Can you spot every detail? Step into the challenge with Detail Hunter!
70010000088220.name: Detail Hunter

70010000088240.description: Dive into Jungle Adventure, a pixel platformer where you explore vibrant jungle landscapes, dodge obstacles, and face off against quirky creatures. Overcome challenging obstacles, battle quirky jungle creatures, and uncover hidden treasures as you progress through vibrant levels. With intuitive controls, retro-style pixel art, and a dynamic soundtrack, each stage offers unique platforming challenges and hidden secrets to discover.
70010000088240.intro: Conquer the jungle, one pixel at a time
70010000088240.name: Jungle Adventure

70010000088649.description: Tombs of Myra is a turn-based puzzle dungeon crawler game.
70010000088649.intro: Descend into the cursed tombs of Myra and free the souls of ancient warriors.
70010000088649.name: Tombs Of Myra

70010000088805.description:
Step into the role of your favorite heroes and villains from across the history of Star Trek and embark on an epic space adventure to control the mysterious Nexus. Battle to save all of existence in Star Trek’s official strategy-based RPG! 

PREPARE FOR ADVENTURE 
Dive into the action with characters spanning the entire Star Trek universe! Take command of the U.S.S. Artemis and recruit a team of legendary Star Trek characters as you embark on daring missions, experience epic turn-based combat, and make choices that influence the game’s entire story. 

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM
Ever wanted to master Spock’s Vulcan nerve pinch or battle with Worf’s deadly bat’leth? Now is your chance! Recruit and command over 70 iconic characters from the Star Trek universe including Kirk, Spock, Picard, Janeway, Data, Burnham, Pike, and many more! Send your Star Trek team on critical missions that will test your crew’s skills and ingenuity. Earn special rewards by completing collections of characters based on the Star Trek shows they appeared in or the traits they possess. Plus, you can earn combat bonuses by using multiple Star Trek characters from the same collection in battle. 

TAKE COMMAND OF THE U.S.S. ARTEMIS
Captain the U.S.S. Artemis and shape the fate of the cosmos! Choose your crew strategically. Each Star Trek character has their own specific skills and abilities to help you outwit, overpower and overcome your enemies. Every decision you make could be the difference between triumph and defeat. Take command, Captain – the galaxy awaits your leadership!

NAVIGATE AN IMMERSIVE UNIVERSE
Dive into the exquisitely crafted 3D world of Star Trek Legends! Explore beautifully rendered 3D worlds and interact with fully realized animated characters in this epic Star Trek RPG. 

Get ready to boldly go where no one has gone before in Star Trek: Legends. Your interstellar adventure awaits!
70010000088805.intro: Captain - The fate of the universe is in your hands!
70010000088805.name: Star Trek: Legends

70010000088879.description:
Golf Up is a fun-loaded golf game you can play with up to 4 friends in several game modes. In Tournament mode, you can pick between the Classic or Points options, in which you earn points by getting good results in the Holes and making quick decisions for bigger bonuses.

Features:
-A variety of holes and game modes.
-Take the wind into account when hitting the ball with effects.
-Easy to play, hard to master.
70010000088879.intro: Enjoy Golf Up with friends and family!
70010000088879.name: Golf Up

70050000053692.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Picard (old) 
- K'ehleyr 
- Thadiun Okona 
- Command ProtoMatter x30
- Orbs x300
- Rare Bio-Gel x3

Increase your power level and save the world!
70050000053692.intro: Invite new commanders on board and build the perfect team!
70050000053692.name: Star Trek: Legends - Command DLC

70050000053693.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:

- Charles “Trip” Tucker III

Increase your power level and save the world!
70050000053693.intro: Invite new engineers on board and build the perfect team!
70050000053693.name: Star Trek: Legends - Engineer DLC

With this DLC, you'll unlock:

70050000053698.name: Star Trek: Legends - Security DLC

70050000053699.name: Star Trek: Legends - Science DLC

70050000053701.name: Star Trek: Legends - Medical DLC

70050000053702.name: Star Trek: Legends - Villains DLC

70070000025799.description:
Step into the role of your favorite heroes and villains from across the history of Star Trek and embark on an epic space adventure to control the mysterious Nexus. Battle to save all of existence in Star Trek’s official strategy-based RPG!

RECEIVE NEW CHARACTERS AND EXTRA RESOURCES
Start your journey with loads of resources and 18 new characters:
• 3 commanders: Picard (old), K'ehleyr and Thadiun Okona
• 3 scientists: Spock (young), Number One and Seska
• 3 engineers: Thy'lek Shran, Charles "Trip" Tucker III and Miles OBrien
• 3 security: Weyoun, Kor and Viceroy
• 3 medics: Guinan, Julian Bashir and Antaak
• 3 villains: Tolian Soran, Founder and Dolim
• Extra resources: x150 ProtoMatter, 1800 orbs, 30000 Latinum, and 18 Rare Bio-Gel

PREPARE FOR ADVENTURE 
Dive into the action with characters spanning the entire Star Trek universe! Take command of the U.S.S. Artemis and recruit a team of legendary Star Trek characters as you embark on daring missions, experience epic turn-based combat, and make choices that influence the game’s entire story.

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM
Ever wanted to master Spock’s Vulcan nerve pinch or battle with Worf’s deadly bat’leth? Now is your chance! Recruit and command over 90 iconic characters from the Star Trek universe including Kirk, Spock, Picard, Janeway, Data, Burnham, Pike, and many more! Send your Star Trek team on critical missions that will test your crew’s skills and ingenuity. Earn special rewards by completing collections of characters based on the Star Trek shows they appeared in or the traits they possess. Plus, you can earn combat bonuses by using multiple Star Trek characters from the same collection in battle.

TAKE COMMAND OF THE U.S.S. ARTEMIS
Captain the U.S.S. Artemis and shape the fate of the cosmos! Choose your crew strategically. Each Star Trek character has their own specific skills and abilities to help you outwit, overpower and overcome your enemies. Every decision you make could be the difference between triumph and defeat. Take command, Captain – the galaxy awaits your leadership!

NAVIGATE AN IMMERSIVE UNIVERSE
Dive into the exquisitely crafted 3D world of Star Trek Legends! Explore beautifully rendered 3D worlds and interact with fully realized animated characters in this epic Star Trek RPG. 

Get ready to boldly go where no one has gone before in Star Trek: Legends. Your interstellar adventure awaits!
70070000025799.intro: Captain - The fate of the universe is in your hands!
70070000025799.name: Star Trek: Legends - Complete Edition

70010000043012.description:
Fun and challenging minigames are waiting for you and your friends. Play and compete to destroy your friends in this unique collection of minigames. This game is a "Multiplayer Party Game". You can play local and online multiplayer. Against 3 of your friends! And offline against Bots.

Gameplay Mechanics: Unique gameplay mechanics in each arena ranging from football to dogfighting in air.

Co-op & Online Competitions: Dive into a series of challenges and uniquely created parkours with 3 of other potatoes online. Compete in leaderboards!
Challenge your friends, Earn higher points. Became the best in the world.



Competitive & Cooperative: Mostly you will find yourself alone among other players; however there will be a map that you should work with your teammate to win! Also don't forget the old saying: "Enemy of my enemy is my friend!"

Customizable Character: Isn't playing with same outfit again and again boring? You will be able to change your clothes and exhibit your sense of fashion to other players!

Note: Local Multiplayer game mode is only possible with multiple controllers.
70010000043012.intro: Potato Arena is a Party Game in which you are playing with total of 4 players. Lots of fun and challenging parkour maps are waiting for you to discover and overco
70010000043012.name: Potato Arena

70010000085685.intro: The Next Level Drift Racing Simulator
70010000085685.name: Drift Legends 2

70010000086302.description:
Immerse yourself in the intense world of 'Prison Escape Simulator: Breakout Master,' a cutting-edge experience where you take on the role of a cunning inmate trapped within the confines of a maximum-security prison. In this adrenaline-fueled adventure, players must navigate a web of intricate missions and challenges, each pivotal in their quest for freedom. From stealthy reconnaissance to bold confrontations, every decision shapes your path to liberation.

Harness your ingenuity to craft elaborate escape plans, utilizing a spectrum of tactics and tools at your disposal. Upgrade your physical prowess and tactical acumen as you earn rewards and accumulate wealth through successful missions. Customize your strategy by purchasing advanced weaponry and essential gear, each item enhancing your ability to outwit vigilant guards and navigate treacherous terrain.

Explore a richly detailed prison environment, from claustrophobic cell blocks to sprawling yards teeming with danger and opportunity. Engage in dynamic interactions with a diverse cast of inmates and guards, each encounter a potential ally or adversary in your quest for freedom. With each daring breakout, you inch closer to unlocking the mysteries of your incarceration and achieving ultimate liberation.

Will you defy the odds, orchestrate a flawless escape, and reclaim your freedom against all odds? 'Prison Escape Simulator: Breakout Master' challenges you to test your limits, strategize with precision, and mastermind the ultimate prison break in this gripping tale of survival and cunning.
70010000086302.intro: Outsmart, escape, survive: break free or be caught.
70010000086302.name: Prison Escape Simulator: Breakout Master

70010000086971.description:
In New Eden, 2099, you are the Phantom, the last human assassin in a city ruled by AI and corrupt corporations. Navigate from towering skyscrapers to grimy slums, armed with cybernetic enhancements and an arsenal of high-tech weapons. Strike fast and disappear without a trace.

Key Features:
- Lightning-Fast Gameplay: Wall-running, time manipulation, and acrobatic moves for fluid movement.
- Stylish Assassinations: Complete contracts on high-profile targets across New Eden.
- Cybernetic Arsenal: Customize your weapons and gadgets for each mission.
- Time Manipulation: Control time to gain an advantage—but be careful, the clock is always ticking.
- Neon-Soaked Open World: Explore a vast, vertical city filled with opportunities for creative kills.
- Trust No One: Navigate betrayal and power struggles in a city that’s out to get you.
- Challenge Mode: Test your skills in time trials and assassination challenges.

In Cyberpunk Speed Assassin, every second matters. Will you rise as the apex predator of New Eden, or fall victim to its deadly pace?
70010000086971.intro: Control time, strike fast, or don’t survive.
70010000086971.name: Cyberpunk Speed Assassin

70010000088064.description:
For some mysterious reason, the protagonist finds himself in sealed rooms wherever he goes.
Seemingly simple at first, solving the puzzles delivers an unmatched sense of satisfaction.

    Episode 4
The stage is set in an actual TV studio!
The protagonist is working as an assistant on a variety show featuring a famous host. After filming wraps up and the cast heads to the green room, our protagonist finishes packing up only to find that the studio doors won’t open!
An unexpected escape adventure begins from a world of lights, cameras, and live audiences.

Featuring fully refined graphics, immersive interactive elements, and various play modes with multiple endings, this game promises a unique experience for every player. With memo and camera functions at your fingertips, it’s designed to be easy for beginners and exciting for veterans alike. Dive into the world of simple yet addictive puzzle-solving with this thrilling escape game!
70010000088064.intro:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 4: Escape from the TV station!
70010000088064.name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep4:The 24-Hour TV Station

70010000089518.description:
BODY CAM SHOOTER delivers an ultra-realistic first-person shooter experience crafted for players who crave authentic, high-stakes action. Step into the role of a tactical operator facing aggressive, armed NPCs in highly detailed environments. Equipped with two distinct weapon types and set across two unique maps, the game emphasizes strategy and adaptability in every encounter.
Key Features:
	•	Smart, Reactive NPCs – Expect a dynamic response from AI-controlled enemies, heightening the realism and challenge of every confrontation.
	•	Next-Generation Graphics – Stunningly detailed environments and smooth animations create a highly immersive atmosphere, pulling you into the action.
	•	Diverse Weaponry and Tactics – With access to two distinct weapon types, players can adjust their playstyle to fit each map and situation.
	•	Two Unique Tactical Maps – Each map presents its own challenges and multiple strategic opportunities, tailored to your approach.
Get ready for a shooter experience like no other, where every decision can mean the difference between survival and defeat!
70010000089518.intro: Feel the thrill of real combat, a shooter like no other!
70010000089518.name: BODY CAM SHOOTER

70010000090042.description:
Let's make oden on the Nintendo Switch™!
Every customer has unique tastes—keep track of each order and don't mess up!
Prepare every order accurately and quickly to keep your customers satisfied!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Stew the ingredients according to your customer's order!
Watch your ingredients carefully as they simmer—if they sit too long, they'll fall apart!
Dish up as much oden as you can to your customers before time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Add ingredients to the pots!

2. Stew the ingredients until their flavors are just right!

3. When you have all the ingredients ready for an order, serve them up!

[Score Attack]
Compete on the global leaderboards with your best score!
Cook skillfully, fill more and more orders, and achieve a new high score!

[Battle]
Have an oden-making showdown with up to 4 players!
Speed and accuracy are the keys to victory!
70010000090042.intro:
It's time for a scrumptious oden-making challenge!
Make as much as you can and watch your food cart prosper!
70010000090042.name: Make it! Oden

70010000090420.description:
Embark on an epic Journey to the West in Wukong Sun: Black Legend! Step into the role of the immortal Wukong, the legendary Monkey King, as he battles through a chaotic world teeming with powerful monsters and untold dangers. Explore a story inspired by Chinese mythology, filled with action-packed battles, stunning environments, and legendary foes.
Features:
Unleash Legendary Power: Take control of Wukong's supercharged abilities and crazy fighting skills to crush all enemies standing in your way. Use strategy and skill to emerge victorious in the heat of battle.
Conquer Four Chaos Maps: Adventure through iconic locations such as the Flower-Fruit Mountain, White Bone Cave, Accumulated Thunder Mountain, and Nibbana, each guarded by formidable bosses like the Bull Demon King, Princess Iron Fan, White Bone Demon, and even Tathagata Buddha’s hand!
Thrilling Levels: Overcome diverse challenges in a wide range of levels filled with dynamic battles, hidden secrets, and mythical lore.
Upgrade and Customize: Strengthen Wukong with powerful upgrades and unlock four distinct skins to suit your style of play.
Immersive Mythological World: Dive into the chaos of a world inspired by ancient legends, blending captivating visuals with unforgettable storytelling.
70010000090420.intro:
Unleash the Legend of the Monkey King!
Battle through chaos, conquer mythical foes, and reclaim your destiny.
70010000090420.name: Wukong Sun: Black Legend

70010000090545.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage captured by an actual flying drone.
There is no up, down, left, or right direction manipulation, only manipulation to speed up/slow down the drone's speed.

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Chuncheon City, Korea, in a "Real" video!
This production takes place on Chuncheon City.
There are 10 flight courses, and the total operating time for all courses is more than 60 minutes.
1080P high-definition video faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real life and provides a strong sense of immersion in the game.
You can feel like you are a real drone pilot with smooth, realistic video playback.
Huge volume! You can fly to 10 locations showing the beautiful scenery of Chuncheon City!
Two play modes are supported: section-by-section driving mode and view mode driving.
Visit Korea’s Chuncheon City anytime from home! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience as well as the scenery of Korea's Chuncheon City.
70010000090545.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000090545.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Chuncheon City

70010000090788.description:
Work together with other players to defeat yokai, punish corrupt officials, and aim for the jackpot. As you progress in the game, you can enhance your abilities with various upgrades.


- Sugoroku
Advance by collecting dice that appear on the board. Various events are triggered depending on the squares you land on.


- Prize Collection
Collect various Edo-period-themed prizes. The more prizes you collect, the more rewards you receive at reach the goal of the Sugoroku.


- Ability Enhancements & Avatars
There are various upgrade features such as Gatling guns, auxiliary launchers, appearance changes for pieces and launchers, attack power upgrades, and increased firing speed.


- Multiplayer
There are two types of multiplayer modes: random matchmaking and friend matchmaking. Whether you want to experience one-time encounters with random players or play with your friends, the game can be played in various styles. You can play with up to four people at once.


- Co-op Events
There are cooperative mini-games such as defeating yokai, punishing corrupt officials and evil magistrates, and dealing with volcanic eruptions. The strength of the yokai increases according to the players' strength, and the stronger the yokai, the more prizes they drop.
70010000090788.intro: This is the 3rd in a series of online co-op coin pusher games, "Old Coin Pusher Friends," set in the Edo period. In this installment, with a Sugoroku (board game).
70010000090788.name: Old Coin Pusher Friends 3

70010000090791.description:
Immerse yourself in a world of high-quality images, where charming girls are waiting for you, demonstrating their seductive forms in the most intriguing poses! The game is created with an emphasis on visual details, conveying the feeling of assembling a real puzzle. As the difficulty increases, the images become more and more piquant. Relax and enjoy every moment of assembling the puzzle.

Features:
• Beautiful girls in provocative outfits
• The ability to examine each image in detail after assembly
• Simple but exciting mechanics that are hard to tear yourself away from
• Gradually increasing puzzle difficulty
• Gentle, relaxing music for complete immersion
70010000090791.intro: Charming girls in Real Hentai 2 are waiting for your touch.
70010000090791.name: Real Hentai 4

70050000022848.description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?
70050000022848.name: Empire of Sin - Expansion 2

70010000086575.description:
Step into the world of Basketball Legends 24, where past, present, and future converge in an epic celebration of hoops culture. Gather your team of legends, experience the evolution of basketball across different eras, and dominate the courts with next-level gameplay and stunning visuals. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a casual fan, this game promises endless excitement and fierce competition.
Features:
- Legendary Squads: Collect iconic players from different generations and assemble your ultimate lineup.
- Timeless Gameplay: Relive the glory days of basketball or experience the cutting-edge future of the sport.
- Unmatched Authenticity: Lifelike visuals and on-court animations deliver an immersive and realistic basketball experience.
- Legacy Mode: Ascend from a rising star to a Hall of Famer, tackling challenges and chasing championships.
- Customization: Personalize your player and showcase your unique style on and off the court.
- Dominate the Competition: Utilize legendary players of the past and present to build a powerful, championship-caliber team.
- Signature Moves and Combos: Master each player’s special moves and unlock devastating combos. Whether it’s a jaw-dropping slam dunk or a slick three-pointer, use these skills to turn the tide of the game!
- Competitive Spirit: Experience the thrill of competition with the game's signature focus on intense, head-to-head battles.
    In Basketball Legends 24, every match is a chance to create unforgettable moments. Will you rise to the challenge and become a basketball legend?
70010000086575.intro: Build Your Dream Basketball Team. Own Your Legacy.
70010000086575.name: Basketball Legends 24

70010000089790.description:
Enter the battlefield, where every step forward is a fight for survival. As a soldier on a high-stakes mission, you’ll traverse dangerous terrain, eliminate enemies, and navigate from point A to point B while facing a series of increasingly difficult challenges.

Game Features:

- Intense Missions: Conquer a variety of missions that demand tactical planning and precise execution. Each mission presents unique objectives, from eliminating waves of impostors to overcoming obstacles that block your path.

- Upgradeable Weapons: As you progress, you’ll earn money that can be used to upgrade your arsenal. Starting with four base weapons, you can expand to six powerful tools, each upgrade improving firepower, accuracy, and effectiveness in battle. Choose from shotguns, rifles, grenades, and more to adapt to each mission’s demands.

- Strategic Combat: The enemies you face are relentless, and you’ll need more than brute force to survive. Plan your weapon selection carefully, analyze enemy patterns, and adjust your approach to overcome powerful impostors and complex barriers. Flexibility and quick thinking are key to victory.

- Dynamic Environments: Each mission takes you through different terrains and battlefields, from war-torn streets to fortified bunkers. The changing environment will require you to adapt your tactics on the fly, using cover, positioning, and movement to gain the upper hand.

- Progressive Difficulty: As you advance through the game, each mission ramps up the difficulty, presenting tougher enemies, more complex objectives, and fiercer battles. Only those with keen reflexes and strategic minds will complete all tasks.

- Rewards and Unlocks: Completing missions not only earns you money for weapon upgrades but also unlocks new gear and abilities. Customize your character’s loadout, enhance your defenses, and unlock special abilities to gain the advantage in tougher battles.

- Immersive Combat Experience: Feel the heat of battle with realistic combat mechanics, intense firefights, and visceral sound effects. Every bullet fired and every obstacle overcome brings you one step closer to completing your mission.


Step into the trenches, where danger lurks at every turn and survival is never guaranteed. Do you have what it takes to defeat your enemies, complete the mission, and emerge victorious? The challenge awaits!
70010000089790.intro: Survive the Frontline: Every Step is a Battle, Every Mission a Fight for Victory!
70010000089790.name: Trench Shooter : Warfare Tactics

70010000090016.description:
The characters are brought to life using E-mote animation system.
When they breathe, wink, or speak, it all looks very realistic.
Additionally, the game features Japanese voice acting.

Time flows like a river, quietly taking away the warmth of the past, yet unable to erase the whispers deeply buried in the heart.  
Memories are like the morning mist, soft and hazy, drifting across the distant years.  
Unspoken longing, like starlight on the far side of time, never extinguished, patiently awaits the moment to be rediscovered.  

An enchanting journey through the silence of time, allowing you to experience the echoes of emotions at the end of time, and feel the eternal bond in the boundless years.
70010000090016.intro: Animation System Visual Novel "Thinking of You Beyond Time"
70010000090016.name: Thinking of You Beyond Time

70010000089343.description:
Are you ready to embark on a spine-chilling adventure? Step into the shoes of the protagonist and experience the terror of being "Buried Alive" in a crypt. Your mission is clear: Escape the confines of your coffin, find the key to unlock the door, and unveil the dark secrets that lie within.
  Your mission: escape the suffocating grip of the coffin and find your way to freedom!
 Unlock the Secrets:
    As you claw your way out of the coffin, you awaken in a desolate crypt, shrouded in darkness. The eerie silence is broken only by the soft drip of water and the faint echoes of your own footsteps. A blood-stained old bat and a cryptic note lay before you, beckoning you to uncover the mysteries that lie ahead.
 Unearth Hidden Clues:
    Explore the crypt's chilling depths and unravel its secrets. Search every nook and cranny, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover hidden clues that will lead you closer to your escape. But be warned, every step you take brings you closer to the lurking dangers that lie within.
 Test Your Ingenuity:
    Your survival hinges on your ability to think on your feet and solve intricate puzzles. Piece together the fragmented clues, decipher cryptic riddles, and unlock the crypt's hidden passages. Your ingenuity will be your greatest ally in this race against time.
 Uncover the Dark Tale:
    As you venture deeper into the crypt's unforgiving chambers, a haunting tale of despair and tragedy unfolds. Unveil the story behind the blood-stained bat and the cryptic note, and uncover the chilling secrets that bind this place.
 Escape or Succumb:
   Every decision you make will determine your fate. Will you conquer your fears and escape the clutches of the crypt, or will you succumb to the darkness that seeks to consume you? The choice is yours, but remember, time is running out.
 Dare to Escape "Buried Alive":
Let the adrenaline rush through your veins. Face your darkest fears, challenge your intellect, and fight for your survival. "Buried Alive" awaits the brave. Will you escape the tomb and see the light of day once more? The crypt awaits your arrival!
70010000089343.intro: Face Your Worst Nightmare: Can You Survive Being Buried Alive?
70010000089343.name: Buried Alive: Breathless Rescue

70050000053771.description:
What to Expect:
- A fresh adventure that takes place after the events of Tavern Talk 
- A new character
- A new recipe & infusion
- 3+ hours of new content
- Branching narratives
- Multiple endings
- Meet a new familiar: Dindi! 

Welcome back, Innkeep! 
Have you been wondering about what happened after you saved the world? How’s life in Asteria now that the dust has settled?

One and a half years after the events of Tavern Talk, young detective Melina finds a mysterious mechanism and breaks it, accidentally unleashing the chaotic spirit trapped inside. Melina and her friends must now race to fix the ancient apparatus, recapture the spirit, and stop a Primordial storm from causing devastating damage.

Meet Oleander Verifina! 
Introducing Fable’s long suffering brother, the chronically overworked ranger of the Ashen Grove. Oleander wants nothing to do with any dangerous exploits, but fate has other ideas... Let's show him the best hospitality the Wayfarer’s Inn has to offer!

Discover a new recipe & infusion! 
A new story brings a fresh breeze! Surf the turbulent waves of the tempest with the slightly frothy Ocean Fizz, and light up your mixtures with some Luminous Algae!

Multiple Endings 
Tempest Tantrum adds roughly three hours of new story to your first playthrough. It also includes four unique endings and three individual quests.
70050000053771.intro: Over a year after the events of Tavern Talk, young detective Melina is on a mission to capture the chaotic spirit she accidentally unleashed upon the world.
70050000053771.name: Tavern Talk: Tempest Tantrum

70050000043776.description: Contains content for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.
70050000043776.name: NBUNSC - DLC Pack 5

70050000045030.description:
Includes playable characters, character costumes, and additional scenarios for use in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

*Please note that this product is included in bundles. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
70050000045030.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash - Hidden Inventory/Premature Death

70050000045031.description:
Includes a set of costumes for playable characters that can be used in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

*Please note that this product is included in bundles. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
70050000045031.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash - Anime Ending Theme 1 Outfit Set

70050000046101.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.
70050000046101.name: SnowRunner - Season 14: Reap & Sow

70050000047076.description: Expand your Expeditions: A MudRunner Game experience with this new DLC.
70050000047076.name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Season 1

70050000047077.description: Expand your Expeditions: A MudRunner Game experience with this new DLC.
70050000047077.name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Season 2

70010000088490.description:
A fighting game where you can control your reach!?
During a match, you can extend the reach of your weapon in exchange for your own stamina!
Extending your reach makes you more likely to be defeated, but it allows you to instantly overcome situations where you are at a disadvantage in distance!
You can also shorten your extended reach, so use it appropriately depending on the situation!
"Should I extend my reach, even though it makes me more likely to die?"
"Should I conserve my stamina, even though I am at a disadvantage in distance?"
The fun is in being caught between two choices that both seem likely to lead to victory!
The thrill of making a decision after much deliberation that leads directly to victory is exceptional!
Adjust your reach flexibly according to your opponent's actions and seize a new kind of victory!
70010000088490.name: Life or Reach

70010000089833.description:
The wild west gets even wilder with the development of cybernetic technology, and it’s up to you to take down the bandit gangs turning this tech against honest and hard-working locals! Step into the role of a steampunk gunslinger with a mechanical arm and loads of enhanced weaponry at your disposal. The Legend of Cyber Cowboy is a top-down twin-stick shooter presented in slick pixel art style.

Blast through waves of cyborg baddies and mechanical monsters in monocles and top hats as you explore dozens of procedurally generated rooms that change with each run to keep you on your leather booted toes. Destroy objects or use them for cover. Collect valuable energy tokens to purchase new weapons at shops. Use energy bursts to dash and dodge. Then prepare for a showdown with huge bosses in bullet hell shootouts.

Are you up to the challenge, Cowboy?

Features:

• Blast through 5 worlds of wild west mayhem as a cybernetic cowboy!
• Navigate procedurally generated saloons and wastelands.
• Collect valuable energy tokens to buy new weapons!
• Face off against big bosses in bullet hell shootouts.
• Enjoy colorful and crisp pixel art presentation!
70010000089833.intro: Liberate a town from gangs of cybernetic bandits as a steampunk gunslinger!
70010000089833.name: The Legend of Cyber Cowboy

70010000089324.description:
Ready to dive into the exciting world of car parking management? Take charge and become the ultimate Parking Lot Tycoon in this thrilling first-person simulation game! Get behind the wheel and drive your success to new heights.
    Unleash Your Business Acumen
As a first-person simulation game, " Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator" puts you in the driver's seat of a car parking manager. Your objective is simple but challenging: build and manage parking lots to maximize your revenue and establish yourself as the top tycoon in the industry.
    Strategic Planning and Upgrades
Every decision counts in your quest for success. Strategically develop and upgrade your parking facilities, ensuring they are attractive, secure, and equipped with the latest technology. Expand your empire by acquiring new properties, optimizing space utilization, and providing exceptional customer service. The sky's the limit!
    Uncover an Engaging Story
Beyond the exciting gameplay, " Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator" delivers an intriguing narrative experience. Unravel the mysteries of the land you own as you progress through the game. Discover the history behind its affordability and uncover the truth behind the legendary curse that has haunted previous owners. Cutscenes triggered by milestones will immerse you in a captivating storyline, adding depth and excitement to your entrepreneurial journey.
    Face Challenges Head-On
Building a parking empire is not without its obstacles. Prepare to tackle unforeseen setbacks and overcome them with your wit and ingenuity. As you develop the land, you may encounter equipment malfunctions, unexplained accidents, or strange weather phenomena. Find innovative solutions, debunk superstitions, and turn setbacks into opportunities.
     Master the Art of Revenue Maximization
Your success as a Parking Lot Tycoon hinges on your ability to keep your hourly rates competitive and attract a steady stream of customers. Balance pricing strategies with customer satisfaction to create a thriving business. Prevent criminal activities, maintain the safety of parked vehicles, and provide exceptional service to keep customers coming back for more.
      Are you ready to build your parking empire and rewrite the history of the land? Embark now on an exhilarating journey of entrepreneurship. Your destiny as the ultimate Parking Lot Tycoon awaits!
70010000089324.intro: Drive your parking empire to success! Be the top manager in the city.
70010000089324.name: Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator

70010000087064.description:
Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you step into the shoes of an elite SWAT operative in "Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions". Immerse yourself in heart-pounding first-person action and lead your squad to victory in intense hostage rescue scenarios. Are you ready to become the ultimate savior in this thrilling shooter game?

Features:
1. Command a diverse team: Lead a squad with unique specialists like assault troops, medics, demolitions experts, and snipers.
2. Strategic planning: Analyze enemy positions, plan your approach, and adapt to dynamic situations in high-risk environments.
3. Intense firefights: Master a variety of weapons and equipment to eliminate threats with precision in fast-paced gunfights.
4. Gripping narrative: Unravel a web of intrigue as you uncover the truth behind the missions through immersive cutscenes.
5. Conquer challenges: Overcome unexpected setbacks, environmental hazards, and enemy reinforcements through quick thinking and decisive action.
6. Test your courage: Lead your team into dangerous situations, demonstrate bravery under fire, and emerge victorious against all odds.

Your courage and tactical prowess will be put to the ultimate test in the fight against injustice. Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become the ultimate hero?
70010000087064.intro: Become an elite operative, rescue hostages, win glory.Intense rescue missions await!
70010000087064.name: Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions

70010000077674.description:
Originally conceived as a reimagining of the 16-bit console classic Ys III: Wanderers From Ys, this fan-favorite entry returns, newly remastered for the Nintendo Switch™ system as Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana. Nearly 15 years after its previous release, longtime fans can look forward to numerous improvements and upgrades, including an all-new voiceover for legendary protagonist, Adol Christin. With remastered high-definition visuals and music, the epic adventure has never looked or sounded better.

Additional features include multiple versions of the sweeping soundtrack, accessibility options, and brand-new character illustrations, making Ys Memoire the definitive edition of the acclaimed masterpiece. 

■Classic RPG Excitement Remastered 
Experience the old-school action RPG combat the Ys series is known for, with added difficulty options and quality-of-life enhancements like “Turbo” mode, as you fight your way through a memorable fantasy world.

■Refined Visual Variety 
Ys Memoire features all-new “Refined” character illustrations throughout the game, but players who want the original experience can switch to the “Classic” versions at a whim.

■A Silent Protagonist No Longer 
Newly recorded voice acting for Adol Christin, including an opening narration that sets the stage for adventure, gives new depth and gravity to the famous hero.

■A Sweeping Soundtrack Reborn 
Well-regarded for its outstanding soundtrack, this version features three different iterations of the epic score (Original, PC-8801, and X68000) for players to choose from, all remastered in high-quality audio.
70010000077674.intro: The classic Ys title returns, remastered for the Nintendo Switch™
70010000077674.name: Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana

70010000089458.description:
Rivenaar's Grove is a top-down fantasy adventure spin on sliding puzzles. The quick little apprentice can only move in straight lines from one border of the field to another. It’s up to you to figure out how to use these nimble movements to gather crops as quickly and efficiently as possible.

Once each field is cleared, you’ll be able to move to the next, with 50 levels in all! As you progress, new traps, obstacles and portals will be introduced, making it even trickier to harvest. To further prove your worth, you can tackle challenge modes with limited moves and time limits. Can the student truly become the master?

Features:

• Take the role of a magician’s apprentice!
• Move in straight lines to harvest crops from fields.
• Overcome obstacles, avoid hazards, use portals and more!
• Respawn and retry levels as many times as it takes.
• Put your skills to the test in special challenge modes!
70010000089458.intro: Harvest ingredients for potions to prove your worth as the apprentice of a skilled magician!
70010000089458.name: Rivenaar's Grove

70010000089664.description:
Being a hero isn't easy. Use all your skills to protect people from the hordes. Stay alert to keep everyone safe.  

Use all available weapons to cause as much damage as possible. Find the explosives on the levels and blow up your enemies.

Clear the all levels from the danger and keep your fortress safe. Shoot. Reload. And shoot again. Repeat.   

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Clear your world from the enemies and keep everyone safe!
70010000089664.intro: Stop the hordes of enemies and defend your castle!
70010000089664.name: Crowd Run

70010000090240.description:
+ Change gravity, pull objects, teleport, and swap positions! This magical gravity gun is so much fun.
+ Enjoy diverse level designs. There’s more than one way to clear each level—unleash your imagination!
+ Use the gravity gun and various mechanisms to defeat all kinds of bosses.

Your spaceship was forced to crash-land on an unknown planet after an unidentified attack. During your exploration, you discovered a magical gravity gun. Now, it's time to escape this strange planet!
70010000090240.intro: Congrats on your magical gravity gun! Escape the planet now!
70010000090240.name: Gravity Escape

70010000090486.description:
Kosmo Skirmish is a multiplayer space combat game. Choose your arsenal carefully to take down your opponents!

Features:
• From 2 to 8 players: on the same screen, online - or both at the same time.
• Procedurally generated destructible terrain.
• Select your equipment of 4 weapons from an arsenal of 12 weapons and tools.
• Several game modes: Each for themselves or as a team.
• Hostile environments: Lava rise, death laser, meteorites, gas balls.
• Game settings: victory points, time, placement.
70010000090486.intro: A multiplayer space combat game. From 2 to 8 players, take on your friends on the various destructible planets.
70010000090486.name: Kosmo Skirmish

70010000088159.description:
Your mission is to rescue the princess, who has been imprisoned in a magical bubble by a terrible monster.

Super Onion Boy+ offers an exhilarating journey in a 2D platformer filled with action and adventure, in the nostalgic retro style. Your mission is to rescue the princess, who has been imprisoned in a magical bubble by a terrible monster.
As you traverse pixel art environments teeming with enemies, get ready to face epic challenges. Collect coins and stars to secure extra lives and discover chests containing magical potions that grant superpowers. These abilities are essential to overcome obstacles and defeat the dreadful monsters and bosses that will cross your path.

Game features
* Retro-style action-adventure gameplay, crafted in pixel art
* Platform game with stunning pixel art graphics
* Epic boss battles
* Magical potions with superpowers
* 8-bit chiptune-style music
70010000088159.intro: Rescue the princess from the magical bubble
70010000088159.name: Super Onion Boy+

70010000088405.description:
A Digital Art Book containing the art works that construct the world of FREEDOM WARS Remastered.

Includes art work created for the original FREEDOM WARS and new visuals created for the Remastered version.
70010000088405.name: FREEDOM WARS Remastered - Digital Art Book

70010000089463.description:
Born into a one-million-year prison sentence, you must survive deadly missions to earn any hope of freedom. Die in prison or live on the battlefield. The choice is yours.

CONVICTED FROM BIRTH FOR THE CRIME OF LIVING
In a distant future where all resources on earth have been depleted, being alive is a sin by itself. As a sinner sentenced to one million years in prison, you must volunteer in dangerous operations to reduce your prison sentence and fight your way to freedom.

THREE-DIMENSIONAL HIGH-SPEED COMBAT
Use your most trusted weapon, your Thorn, to dominate the battlefield. Stand alongside your allies and your warden cyborg Accessory to face off against powerful enemies.

ENHANCED GRAPHICS
Re-rendered graphics vividly portray desolate worlds, colossal prison cities, powerful enemies, and fierce battles.

New features in the remastered version:
- High-resolution textures
- Added difficulty level settings
- Overhauled weapon crafting system

*A Contribution Edition is also available. Please take care not to make duplicate purchases.
70010000089463.name: FREEDOM WARS Remastered

70010000089535.description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Chained Climb Together. Bound by mystical chains with your companions, your goal is to ascend towering mountains by navigating treacherous terrains and overcoming obstacles. Perfect coordination is crucial as you tackle the rugged, vertical landscapes filled with unique challenges.
Key Features:
• Vertical Challenge: Experience a unique twist on the climbing genre as you scale from the mountain base to its peak.
• Chain Mechanics: Realistic chain dynamics add strategic depth to your ascent through perilous terrains.
• Diverse Landscapes: Explore various mountainous environments with distinct and challenging conditions.
• Difficulty Modes: Choose from Beginner, Normal, and Extreme modes to match your skill level.
• Conquer Heights: Claim and dominate new mountain areas as you climb higher.
• Quests and Missions: Complete quests to test your skills and unlock new abilities.
• Skills and Abilities: Master and upgrade powerful skills to aid your climb to the summit.
Overcome Challenges Together Navigate perilous mountain terrains while chained to your companions. Play solo or team up in multiplayer mode, requiring precision and coordination for survival. Embrace the challenge, master the strategy, and lead your team to the top.
70010000089535.intro: Balance between you and your partner, survive together! One chain - one life, prove your ability to cooperate!
70010000089535.name: Chained Climb Together

70010000090308.description:
Enter a brutal battle where every moment is a test of survival. In a world where danger lurks around every corner, your instincts will be your greatest weapon. Choose your landing spot wisely, gather weapons, and prepare to face waves of opponents, all fighting for the same goal: to be the last one standing. With each passing second, the battlefield shrinks, intensifying the fight until only one victor remains. Will you rise above the chaos, or be defeated by your rivals?

Key features:

- Explosive and dynamic start: Carefully choose your landing spot, plan your every step, and begin the battle with limited resources.

- Resource gathering and management: Find and collect a wide range of weapons and equipment, including assault rifles, sniper scopes, grenades, and first aid kits, to secure your superiority on the battlefield.

- Face off against enemies: You’ll face a multitude of powerful opponents who must be defeated to claim the top spot. Be ready for an intense battle where every decision can make the difference.

- Shrinking play area: The increasing intensity forces you to move and fight strategically as the map continues to shrink.

- Customization and upgrade system: Earn points and rewards as you eliminate opponents and use them to customize your character and arsenal, giving you a unique advantage in every match.

Prepare to explore, fight, and survive in a game that tests your reflexes, strategies, and courage. Will you be able to push your limits and emerge victorious in a battle royale where only the strongest and smartest triumph? Step into the arena and prove your mastery.
70010000090308.intro: Where Survival is Earned, Victory is Inherited.
70010000090308.name: Battle Royal -  Battlegrounds Call

70050000054003.description:
A set of items to make your sinner life more comfortable. 

Includes:
1. Lv4 Weapon Set
 - Murasame Mk 9
 - EZ Falke II
 - Hawkshadow
 - TB-32/H
 - Aftershadow
 - Mimas
 - L-6E1
 - Holy Lance
 - Gration

2. Additional Modules
 - Power Up (XL)
 - Head-Component Damage Up (XL)
 - Pod Damage Up (XL)
 - Clip Size Up (XL)
 - Carryable Ammo Up (XL)

3. Production/Upgrade Support Citizens
 - 4 Citizens

4. Limited Augmentation
 - Rare Drops Up

*Some of the items will be usable after a certain point in the game progress.
*Production/Upgrade Support Citizens will be usable from after reaching Level 2
*Limited Augmentation will be usable after reaching Level 4
70050000054003.name: FREEDOM WARS Remastered - Contribution Boost Pack

70070000025605.description:
The Contribution Edition includes:
- FREEDOM WARS Remastered
- Contribution Boost Pack
- Digital Art Book

Born into a one-million-year prison sentence, you must survive deadly missions to earn any hope of freedom. Die in prison or live on the battlefield. The choice is yours.

CONVICTED FROM BIRTH FOR THE CRIME OF LIVING
In a distant future where all resources on earth have been depleted, being alive is a sin by itself. As a sinner sentenced to one million years in prison, you must volunteer in dangerous operations to reduce your prison sentence and fight your way to freedom.

THREE-DIMENSIONAL HIGH-SPEED COMBAT
Use your most trusted weapon, your Thorn, to dominate the battlefield. Stand alongside your allies and your warden cyborg Accessory to face off against powerful enemies.

ENHANCED GRAPHICS
Re-rendered graphics vividly portray desolate worlds, colossal prison cities, powerful enemies, and fierce battles.

New features in the remastered version:
- High-resolution textures
- Added difficulty level settings
- Overhauled weapon crafting system

*A Standard Edition is also available. Please take care not to make duplicate purchases.
70070000025605.name: FREEDOM WARS Remastered Contribution Edition

70070000025965.description:
Land of Mushrooms - Game Modes Edition:

Immerse yourself in the magical world of mushrooms with the complete Land of Mushrooms experience! Merge, grow, and master fungi in the main game, then enjoy exciting new challenges with two thrilling add-ons: 

- Small Mode, where tiny mushrooms create bigger challenges for a relaxing, extended gameplay experience.

- Coop Mode, where you and a friend work together to grow mushrooms and strategize for the highest scores. Discover the full adventure with new ways to play and endless fun!
70070000025965.intro: Merge, grow, and play together in the magical world of mushrooms!
70070000025965.name: Land of Mushrooms - Game Modes Edition

70010000091135.description:
Play as a frantic little bunny as you dash between floors, walls and ceilings collecting power dots and yummy carrots. Mazelike stages will take you from grassy wilds to twisted caverns and deadly laboratories. The bunny moves in lightning quick straight lines and clings to walls and ceilings, but you’ll still need to strategically maneuver him around traps and enemies to keep him safe from harm.

Find keys to unlock doors, dodge laser beams, avoid roving robots and more! Can you survive all 100 levels?

Features:

• Navigate mazelike stages with precision platforming!
• Dash between floors and walls or even cling to the ceiling.
• Avoid traps and roving enemies as stages grow in complexity!
• Collect dots and carrots to open the portal!
• Survive 100 tricky levels!
70010000091135.intro: Get ready for a fast and furry twist on puzzle action in side-scrolling pixel art platforming style!
70010000091135.name: Runny Bunny

70010000072396.description:
You are Shin, a demon hunter with no memory of his past. After striking an unusual partnership with Lux, a demon with the ability to shapeshift into a sword and manipulate time, you begin a quest to learn what happened to you and your loved ones. Fight brutal battles against terrible demons. Explore a corrupted and dangerous world. Regain what was once yours.

Gameplay Overview :
- As the Demon Sword, Lux offers a wide array of utilities. She can perform powerful attacks and shield you from harm, but also act as a platform and even restore objects that were once lost. Use your demonic companion to traverse and survive in a desolate, demon-ridden Osaka.

- As Shin defeats demons and levels up, new skills can be unlocked via skill tree. Unlock the "Warp" skill to travel anywhere on the map or a double-jump to get up to higher ledges and explore new locations with ease.

- Lux isn't the only weapon in your arsenal. In addition to his main firearm, Shin can wield other weapons such as greatswords and whips. Experiment with a variety of armaments and create your own style of combat.

- Enjoy the latest metroidvania from Team Ladybug, the team behind such acclaimed titles as "Touhou Luna Nights" and "Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth".
- Explore a map far larger than past Team Ladybug projects, filled with side quests that both deepen your connection to and expand upon the world of "Blade Chimera".

The Story :
It all began with the sudden appearance of a ghastly demonic horde. Humans fought against ghouls and ghosts in what would later be known as the "Demon War," and the world was changed forever.
Thirty years later, using their expertise in combatting demons, a religious group called the "Holy Union" has carved out a small but stable enclave of survivors.
70010000072396.intro: You are Shin, a demon hunter. Battle demons, regain lost skills, and uncover the truth of your forgotten past in this occult-inspired cyberpunk metroidvania.
70010000072396.name: Blade Chimera

70010000072754.description:
Morkull Ragast's Rage is a 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration.

You control Morkull, the villain of the story, who not only knows he's a character in a video game, but is also aware of the player who controls him (i.e., you) and the developers who created him (i.e., us).

Your objective? Help Morkull escape from the Ragast so he can rule the world and carry out his evil plans.
You know, typical cliché villain stuff...


Art and Animation

Morkull Ragast's Rage is completely hand-drawn and animated frame-by-frame. Inspired and influenced by traditional animated films and other 2D video games, the old-school style gives life and fluidity of movement to the whole cast of characters.

Break the Fourth Wall

What makes this game special is Morkull himself, his personality, and his ability to break the fourth wall to talk with the players like he was there in the room.

Morkull possesses charisma and charm, and never fails to create a light-hearted atmosphere with his endless humor, bad jokes and pop culture references.

Combat System

You'll have all the power of the God of Death and Darkness at your fingertips, of course, along with an ample selection of combos and abilities that will open up even the most remote corners of the Ragast.

Become Part of the Ragast and Join Our Community

Once you enter the Ragast, you'll never leave - unless you can get through Morkull… So why not join his ranks and support his Machiavellian cause with the rest of his champions as part of our Morkull Ragast's Rage community.
70010000072754.intro: Help Morkull escape this cursed Metroidvania video game!
70010000072754.name: Morkull Ragast's Rage

70010000084604.description:
Help Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong recover their precious banana hoard from the villainous Tiki Tak Tribe! Stomp enemies, blast through barrels, and ride rockets and mine carts (and even Rambi the rhino) in 80 levels across nine worlds.  

Play the game as it was first designed for the Wii™ system, or reduce the difficulty for extra hearts and other goodies to make your journey a little easier. This barrel-blasting adventure is visually enhanced in HD for the Nintendo Switch™ system and includes the extra levels from the Nintendo 3DS™ version! 

Team up with a friend and take on the whole game as Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong  

Pass a Joy-Con™ controller to a buddy and take on the Tiki Tak Tribe as DK and Diddy in two-player local play. Pelt foes with Diddy’s Peanut Popgun and hover using his Barrel Jet, and slam bad guys into submission with DK’s Ground Pound—or just Barrel Roll right through them. Work together to reclaim those bananas by the bunch!
70010000084604.intro: Jump, roll, and stomp through Donkey Kong Island in 2D platforming action
70010000084604.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns HD

70010000085606.description:
A collectors dream !! A compilation consisting of the original DreadOut and DreadOut : Keepers of the Dark

About DreadOut:

DreadOut is a third person supernatural horror game where you play as Linda, a high school student trapped in an old abandoned town. Equipped with her trusty smart-phone and an SLR camera, she will battle against terrifying encounters and solve mysterious puzzles which will ultimately determine her fate.

Help her overcome the challenges that will stand before her. Survive the Dread!

When a group of high school students went astray from a field trip, they came across something totally unexpected. A town long forgotten trapped in a peaceful state of slumber. What they did not realize was what lurks within. And what seemed like an innocent stroll turns into disaster as the secluded town reveals its dark and terrible secrets. The presence of sinister forces from beyond their realm of existence.

It all comes down to Linda. She will experience stirrings of unfamiliar powers, emerging from within her. These new found abilities might just be the only way she can save her own life and those of her friends.

About DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark

DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark is a new standalone horror game that takes place in the DreadOut universe. In this missing chapter, you will help Linda face the challenges of the DreadOut world with even more dangers lurking within.

Follow the event in which Linda was transported by The Mysterious Lady in Red into The Mirror Realm. A portal of worlds that connects it to 8 haunted dominions where 13+ horrific ghosts are ready to greet her in the most terrifying way possible. They will stop at nothing to thwart your main objective: To survive!

So, get your smart phone and SLR camera ready and choose your path wisely. The doors you open will decide the outcome of Linda’s fate.
70010000085606.intro: Where the world of Dread begins!!
70010000085606.name: DreadOut Remastered Collection

70010000088646.description:
Who cares about the ordinary cards? And only the chosen few know that they can be a real treasure! Your collecting dreams can come true. 

Open a trading card shop in your town and expand across the world. Let the passionate come to you and find something special. Create an iconic place for your friends to gather! 

Expand and upgrade your store. Become a true perfectionist and turn this boring space into a stylish home for collectors. 

Organize the space - add new features so everyone can find what they are looking for. Open new zones for customers to buy, trade or play in. 

Search for rare collections and sell them in your store. Find the diamonds for you and your special collections!    

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Make your store and card collection the best in the world!
70010000088646.intro: Turn your card collecting dream into a real business!
70010000088646.name: Trading Card Shop Simulator

70010000091489.description:
Venture through a labyrinth of seemingly endless, creepily familiar corridors based on popular Creepypasta lore. Experience the terror with high-quality graphics that bring the eerie environment to life, and envelop yourself in a soundscape of detailed 3D audio that enhances every haunting whisper and distant footstep. The atmosphere is thick with dread, filled with puzzles that challenge the mind and screamers that test your resolve, ensuring a pulse-pounding journey into the unknown.

High-Quality Graphics – Immerse yourself in an environment where every detail is crafted to enhance the horror.
Detailed 3D Audio – Every sound is designed to amplify the suspense and immerse you deeper into the game.
Creepy Atmosphere – The constant, oppressive dread is carefully maintained to keep you on edge.
Challenging Puzzles – Test your wits with intricate puzzles that integrate seamlessly into the narrative.
Effective Screamers – Prepare for heart-stopping moments that are sure to keep the adrenaline pumping.
70010000091489.name: BACKROOMS INSIDE THE ESCAPE

70010000072916.description:
Tales of Graces f is back with a beautiful and easier-to-play version!

The game also includes Lineage and Legacies, an after-story to the main scenario!

Tales of Graces f is an action RPG about adventure in fantasy worlds and overcoming obstacles through friendship and determination.

• A child’s promise is the world’s last hope
On a lush green planet called Ephinea, three young children make a promise to each other that could save the future.
Asbel, heir to a local lord, Richard, prince of the Windor kingdom, and Sophie, a strange girl with no known past, all swear a special friendship oath after helping each other survive a dangerous attempt on Richard’s life in the land of Lhant.
Years later, the world has changed. Asbel and his friends must face grave danger when Lhant becomes the battleground for a power grab among the three great nations of Ephinea. It is at this moment when an even greater threat is revealed and the bonds between the young heroes are put to the test with everything at stake.

• Exhilarating continuous action with two styles to choose from!
The Style Shift Linear Motion Battle System allows players to switch between two very different battle styles, Artes  and Burst.
You can choose the strength and range of the party’s attacks, the size of the attack, and how close or far away you need to be to the enemy for maximum effectiveness.

• Addition of convenient functions and improved graphics
Quality-of-life  functions have been added, such as auto-save, various skip functions, the ability to turn off enemy encounters in fields and dungeons, and more.

• Full character development and item elements
There are more than 100 different equipable titles that players can rank up through battles, allowing them to learn various skills and techniques that strengthen their stats.

• Lineage and Legacies depicts the world after the ending
Six months have passed since the journey around the world. Sophie is troubled by uncomfortable thoughts about her eventual future and she is determined to find a way out. 
At the same time, strange changes spread throughout Ephinea once again. While Asbel is concerned about Sophie, she and her friends set out to investigate the cause of the anomaly...
70010000072916.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered

70010000088886.description:
Challenge yourself to new heights in Ultimate Rock Climbing Challenge! This immersive game puts you in the shoes of a daring climber, scaling breathtaking cliffs and conquering challenging routes. Master the art of climbing, explore diverse locations, and customize your climber to become a legend of the rocks!
Features:
- Diverse Ascents: Conquer 5 unique climbing locations, each offering stunning visuals and distinct challenges.
- Master Every Climb: Progress through a variety of routes, from beginner-friendly tutorials to heart-pounding expert levels.
- Time is Money (Stars): Push your limits and earn more stars with faster climbs, fueling your progression.
- Rock Your Style: Personalize your climber's look with earnable in-game currency.
- Unlock the Climb: Collect stars to unlock new locations and expand your climbing horizons.
Ultimate Rock Climbing Challenge delivers a captivating and rewarding experience. With stunning visuals, immersive gameplay, and extensive customization options, this game will have you scaling new heights in no time!
70010000088886.intro: Experience risk in truly wild conditions - become a rock climber!
70010000088886.name: Ultimate Rock Climbing Challenge

70050000052919.description:
Unlock the in-game item Super Adventuring Assistance Set early for Tales of Graces f Remastered.

Includes:
• Apple Gel x 10
• Grape Gel x 10
• Life Bottle x 10
• Panacea Bottle x 10

*This set can be obtained through game progression.
70050000052919.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Super Adventuring Assistance Set

70050000052920.description:
A set of red herbs that can permanently boost a character’s stats in Tales of Graces f Remastered.

Includes:
• Red Sage×15
• Red Savory×15
• Red Rosemary×15
• Red Lavender×15
• Red Verbena×15
• Red Chamomile×15
• Red Saffron×15

*This set can be obtained through game progression.
70050000052920.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Super Growth Support Herb Set

70050000052921.description: This pack allows players to change the normal battle music of Tales of Graces f Remastered to BGM from past Tales of series.
70050000052921.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Battle BGM pack

70070000025239.description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Graces f Remastered
• Battle BGM pack
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Super Growth Support Herb Set

Tales of Graces f is back with a beautiful and easier-to-play version!

The game also includes Lineage and Legacies, an after-story to the main scenario!

Tales of Graces f is an action RPG about adventure in fantasy worlds and overcoming obstacles through friendship and determination.

• A child’s promise is the world’s last hope
On a lush green planet called Ephinea, three young children make a promise to each other that could save the future.
Asbel, heir to a local lord, Richard, prince of the Windor kingdom, and Sophie, a strange girl with no known past, all swear a special friendship oath after helping each other survive a dangerous attempt on Richard’s life in the land of Lhant.
Years later, the world has changed. Asbel and his friends must face grave danger when Lhant becomes the battleground for a power grab among the three great nations of Ephinea. It is at this moment when an even greater threat is revealed and the bonds between the young heroes are put to the test with everything at stake.

• Exhilarating continuous action with two styles to choose from!
The Style Shift Linear Motion Battle System allows players to switch between two very different battle styles, Artes  and Burst.
You can choose the strength and range of the party’s attacks, the size of the attack, and how close or far away you need to be to the enemy for maximum effectiveness.

• Addition of convenient functions and improved graphics
Quality-of-life  functions have been added, such as auto-save, various skip functions, the ability to turn off enemy encounters in fields and dungeons, and more.

• Full character development and item elements
There are more than 100 different equipable titles that players can rank up through battles, allowing them to learn various skills and techniques that strengthen their stats.

• Lineage and Legacies depicts the world after the ending
Six months have passed since the journey around the world. Sophie is troubled by uncomfortable thoughts about her eventual future and she is determined to find a way out. 
At the same time, strange changes spread throughout Ephinea once again. While Asbel is concerned about Sophie, she and her friends set out to investigate the cause of the anomaly... cause of the anomaly...
70070000025239.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered Deluxe Edition

70010000089198.description:
Step into the untamed wilderness of Isolation Instinct, a captivating open-world survival game where you are the architect of your own destiny. Carve a path through a vast forest teeming with life, danger, and opportunity. Every decision you make will impact your journey as you fight to survive and build a haven in the heart of nature.
Features:
- Explore Diverse Environments: Uncover unique landscapes, climates, and inhabitants across four distinct regions.
- Master Survival: Gather resources, hunt, fish, and build shelter to thrive in the wild.
- Deep Crafting: Craft tools, weapons, clothes, and more to customize your experience.
- Build Your Civilization: Erect defenses and establish your own haven in the wilderness.
- Skill Development: Sharpen your survival skills to become a master of the wild.
- Immersive Experience: Your success depends on your wit and determination.
Embrace the challenge. The forest awaits.
70010000089198.intro: Show your ability to survive! Be a part of a wild world with unlimited borders!
70010000089198.name: Isolation Instinct: Farming, Craft, Survival

70010000054935.description:
Old-school challenge and style collide with modern advancements and mission design in Gravitators, a twin-stick shooter that puts you in control of 4 different ships as you defend mankind against invasion! Complete a vast array of mission types as you travel to Earth, the Moon, asteroids, planets and exoplanets, the depths of outer space and even black holes!
